content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 30 May 2018How long do Maybank takes to do the prefunded account for MIP?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 31 May 2018I cannot remember exactly how long it takes but from my experience, it takes a while.​First of all, you have to set up the prefunded account and get them to connect to your CDP account, which itself takes around 3 days i think.​Then the GIRO link. That is the longest. Average 1 to 2 weeks.  And it takes 3 days for the money to reflect after you have transferred the money​After which you just need to log on to your Maybank KE account, select eservices and activate the MIP. That one is quite fast though.​Lastly, just make sure you have money by the 8th of every month as this is when they will purchase the stock of your choice.​This is a very useful website to refer to: https://www.maybank-ke.com.sg/contact-us/faqs/ke-trade/0 comments1
William NgLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 26 May 2019It takes 1 working day for my funds to appear in my prefunded account via paynow.0 comments0
